column2: "I don't need to explain it, do I? Just kill all the Darkers you can. I don't really need anything other than that."

"I'm not interested in getting to know you.
All that's required is the ability to kill all those
abominations you encounter."

"I believe you at least have that, so hurry
up and get on with the request."

"もう説明は必要ないだろう？
ダーカーを殺せるだけ殺してきて。
それ以外は特に求めてないから。"

"馴れ合いも付き合いも必要ない。
必要なのは、あいつらを殺し尽くす
力だけ。"

"あんたはそれがあるんだし
さっさと依頼、やってきてよね。"
